cause.description:
The essence of conservatism is the belief that you are intelligent, ambitious, entrepreneurial, positive, responsible, and self-sustaining.
Conservatism promotes: -Limited government -A large military to defend ourselves from attack and to secure our position as the most powerful country in the world -A free and open market fueled by capitalism and the spirit of entrepreneurialism -Low and flat taxes -Private health care -Private education
Conservatism states that it is not the government's responsibility to provide you with health care, education, jobs, or success. It is your responsibility to gain these for yourself.
1. America was founded on Conservatism
2. Government should be limited
3. Taxes should be low and flat
4. Military should be powerful
5. Healthcare should be private
cause.mission: Educate and support Americans in conservative thought
cause.name: Spread Conservatism
